title: The Stop Sign of Self-Care
caption: Setting boundaries is like putting up a stop sign. It tells others what you will and won't tolerate. It protects your energy. It preserves your peace. Respect yourself enough to say no.
prompt: A stylized illustration of a stop sign, but instead of the word 'STOP,' it reads 'MY BOUNDARY.' The background is a peaceful, calming landscape with soft pastel colors.  Focus is on the sign, making it easily readable and impactful.  No text other than 'MY BOUNDARY' on the stop sign.

title: Building a Fence
caption: Think of boundaries as a fence around your garden. They define your space. They keep out unwanted weeds. They allow you to nurture what matters most. Protect what's yours.
prompt: A charming, slightly whimsical illustration of a small garden enclosed by a picket fence. The garden contains healthy, vibrant plants and flowers. A few weeds are trying to poke through the fence, but are clearly being kept at bay. Sunny, cheerful atmosphere.

title: Emptying Your Cup
caption: You can't pour from an empty cup. Setting boundaries helps you recharge. It prevents burnout. It ensures you have enough to give. Prioritize your well-being first.
prompt: A visually appealing image of a beautifully crafted teacup. The cup is completely empty and slightly cracked. Light softly illuminating the emptiness within. The background is blurred and muted, drawing focus to the empty cup.

title: The Life Raft
caption: Boundaries are like a life raft. They keep you afloat when life gets overwhelming. They prevent you from being pulled under. They provide stability. Hold onto your raft.
prompt: A small, simple life raft bobbing in a slightly choppy sea. The sky is overcast but not stormy.  The raft should appear sturdy and reliable. The overall mood should be one of resilience and safety.

title: Saying No
caption: Saying 'no' is a complete sentence. You don't need to justify it. You don't need to apologize. It's your right to protect your time and energy. Own your 'no'.
prompt: A single, bold word 'NO' written in a strong, modern font. The background is a minimalist, solid color.  The 'NO' should be visually striking and assertive.  Avoid any distracting elements.

title: The Shield of Self-Respect
caption: Boundaries are a shield of self-respect. They deflect negativity. They protect your values. They reinforce your worth. Wear your shield proudly.
prompt: An artistic representation of a shield. Instead of a coat of arms, it displays the word 'RESPECT' prominently. The shield has a polished, elegant look. The background is a soft, ethereal glow.

title: The Personal Bubble
caption: Visualize your personal bubble. This is your space, your energy. Protect it from intrusions. Control who and what you let in. Guard your bubble fiercely.
prompt: A transparent, shimmering bubble surrounding a person. The person inside is calm and relaxed. Outside the bubble, there are blurred shapes and colors representing external pressures. The bubble is clear and defined.

title: Unlocking Inner Peace
caption: Setting boundaries unlocks inner peace. It reduces stress. It improves relationships. It creates space for joy. Find your peace.
prompt: A golden key unlocking a door that leads to a serene and sunlit garden. The garden is filled with flowers and butterflies. The overall feeling is one of tranquility and hope.

title: The Line in the Sand
caption: Draw a line in the sand. Know your limits. Be clear about what you will and won't accept. Defend your line. Stand firm.
prompt: A stark image of a line drawn in the sand on a beach. The ocean is in the background, but it's calm and peaceful. The line is clear and distinct, symbolizing a boundary. The sand is warm-toned.
